name: Gravitorium
description:
My first real project I worked on around September 2019 in Godot. Heavily inspired portal puzzle game, where instead of getting a portal gun, you get a gravity gun. The idea was to solve puzzles using that! I ran out of ideas for the game very quickly. But making this game helped me learn more about game development and improve! I 

The game has about 10 levels. And there's an elevator at the end of each section in the game. Please give any feedback if you want, the game is pretty much going to remain unfinished. I would rather remake the game from scratch but make it a lot better now that my skills have improved since making this.
